item.title: Winklevoss’ Gemini Up 64% as IPO Leads Crowded Slate of Debuts
item.description: Gemini Space Station Inc. shares jumped as much as 64% from their IPO price after the cryptocurrency exchange led by the billionaire Winklevoss twins raised $425 million in a packed week for US listin

item.title: Winklevoss’ Gemini Up 64% as IPO Leads Crowded Slate of Debuts
item.description: Gemini Space Station Inc. shares jumped as much as 64% from their IPO price after the cryptocurrency exchange led by the billionaire Winklevoss twins raised $425 million in a packed week for US listin

item.title: Winklevosses’ Crypto Exchange Gemini IPO Raises $425 Million
item.description: Gemini Space Station Inc. raised $425 million in an initial public offering, pricing its stock above a marketed range and shrinking the number of shares.

item.title: Winklevosses’ Crypto Exchange Gemini IPO Raises $425 Million
item.description: Gemini Space Station Inc. raised $425 million in an initial public offering, pricing its stock above a marketed range and shrinking the number of shares.

item.title: Crypto Exchange Gemini Raises US IPO Target to $433.3 Million
item.description: Gemini Space Station Inc. increased the potential size of its initial public offering to $433.3 million, after the oversubscribed listing drew a private placement from another exchange operator.

item.title: Crypto Exchange Gemini Raises US IPO Target to $433.3 Million
item.description: Gemini Space Station Inc. increased the potential size of its initial public offering to $433.3 million, after the oversubscribed listing drew a private placement from another exchange operator.

item.title: Nasdaq to Invest $50 Million in Gemini Crypto Exchange
item.description: The Winklevoss twins’ Gemini Space Station Inc. has secured a $50 million investment from Nasdaq Inc. in a private placement as the crypto exchange prepares for an initial public offering.

item.title: Nasdaq to Invest $50 Million in Gemini Crypto Exchange
item.description: The Winklevoss twins’ Gemini Space Station Inc. has secured a $50 million investment from Nasdaq Inc. in a private placement as the crypto exchange prepares for an initial public offering.
